name: Fantasy Friends (Demo!)
description:
Want friends, specifically fantasy species characters crafted from my mushy rotted mind??? You're in LUCK!

I present: Fantasy Friends 

After years of different schools, new houses and zero friends, in your senior year of high school at a new place 3 particular students catch your eye...

A friendly orange puff of a halfling,

The towering and silent half-orc, 

and the elegant but aloof aarakocra (owlboy).

WHO WILL YOU CHOOSE?

Why has god forsaken us?

THAT'S A QUESTION ONLY YOU CAN ANSWER!

SO COME ALONG AND JOIN THE RIDE.

enjoy yourself.
